thread.title: First Winter Surf Camp in Port Stephens
thread.title_full: First Winter Surf Camp in Port Stephens | Travelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: First Winter Surf Camp in Port Stephens
text:
First Winter Surf Camp in Port Stephens Published on : Thursday, July 30, 2015
Calling all young surfers – Port Stephens Surf School has partnered with Port Stephens Treescape to offer the first two-day winter surf camp on the weekend of Saturday, August 8 and Sunday, August 9, 2015.
Open to both boys and girls under 18, the inaugural camp is designed to help young surfers improve their skills and abilities and provide a competitive edge on the waves.The professional surf coaches from the Port Stephens Surf School will help all surfers improve their skills through the use of drill work, video analysis, core fitness exercises, mental techniques,nutritional assistance and equipment advice, whilst also working closely with surfers to assist in improving and fine tuning their individual style.
The supervised camp costs $200 and includes one-night’s accommodation at Port Stephens Treescape at One Mile, all meals, high performance coaching and a surf school singlet.
Source: Port Stephens
